title: Import of VNC connection files
author: mgaugusch
body_snippet:
I got lots of ".vnc" files and would like to import them into mRemoteNG.

## Expected Behavior
When I start the import, "*.vnc" files shall be offered as valid import source. Possibly, drag & drop of such files into a folder in mRemoteNG shall add them there as well.

## Current Behavior
The "*.vnc" files are not recognized at all. 

## Possible Solution
The *.vnc files are simple text files with information like this:
`ConnMethod=tcp`
`ConnTime=2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z`
`FriendlyNam...

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.77.4
